ibis.ipl.registry

Class Registry

  • java.lang.Object
    • ibis.ipl.registry.Registry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ibis.ipl.Manageable, ibis.ipl.Registry
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ForwardingRegistry, NullRegistry, Registry, Registry

    public abstract class Registry
extends java.lang.Object
implements ibis.ipl.Registry
    This implementation of the Registry interface defines the API between an Ibis implementation and the registry. This way, an Ibis implementation can dynamically load any registry implementation.

      • leave

        public abstract void leave()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Notifies the registry that the calling Ibis instance is leaving.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - may be thrown when communication with the registry fails.

      • getSequenceNumber

        public abstract long getSequenceNumber(java.lang.String name)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Obtains a sequence number from the registry. Each sequencer has a name, which must be provided to this call.
        Specified by:
        getSequenceNumber in interface ibis.ipl.Registry
        Parameters:
        name - the name of this sequencer.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - may be thrown when communication with the registry fails.

      • createRegistry

        public static Registry createRegistry(ibis.ipl.IbisCapabilities capabilities,
                                      ibis.ipl.RegistryEventHandler handler,
                                      java.util.Properties properties,
                                      byte[] data,
                                      java.lang.String implementationVersion,
                                      byte[] tag,
                                      ibis.ipl.Credentials credentials)
                               throws java.lang.Throwable
        Creates a registry for the specified Ibis instance.
        Parameters:
        capabilities - capabilities required of this registry
        handler - the handler for registry events, or null if no registry events are needed.
        properties - to get some properties from, and to pass on to the registry.
        data - the implementation dependent data in the IbisIdentifier.
        implementationVersion - the identification of this Ibis implementation. Must be identical for all Ibises in a single pool.
        tag - the application level tag for the Ibis which is constructing this registry.
        credentials - authentication object to authenticate ibis at registry
        Returns:
        the registry
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable - can be any exception resulting from looking up the registry constructor or the invocation attempt.
